This app was created by Evan and his company\n\n
ECMEDIAGROUP\n\nIt originally started out as a project for class when he was attending Brookdale Community College and then continually progressed over the course of a year and a half.
\n\nThe goal of this app is to have a centralized hub of information to help you study quickly for a test or if you need information right at your fingertips. This is only the first version of the app, the next version we intended on implementing many more features such as real time messaging where you can have a group chat with other users who might be in your class or whatever the case may be. This will be introduced in the next update.
\n\nMore information about Evan can be found in the link below.

We have made this app trying to keep ads to the absolute minimium and to try not to disrupt the User Experience with any disruptive ads when you are trying to study. We tried to only put them into the app where we have extra space.\n\nThank you for your support.
